title: # 377 - Andrew Dice Clay & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Andrew Dice Clay to talk about touring, selling out MSG, his acting career, girlfriends, the beauty of romance, and much more!

Dice will be at The Stand in NY December 10th, 17th, & 18th

This episode is brought to you by Tushy. Go to www.hellotushy.com/Bert and get 10% off your order.

This episode is brought to you by Mercari. Check out Mercari and make every day “Sell your shit Sunday.” Download the Mercari app in the App Store today! 

This episode is also brought to you by Stance. Get a free pair of socks with your next order by going to www.stance.com/Bert

Tickets to my "Berty Boy" Tour are on sale now!

Go to www.bertbertbert.com for tickets!

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com To Follow me on.. Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
